name: bindingly
content:

in a way that cannot be legally avoided or stopped: He stated, "We intend to bring about the sale of the company as was bindingly agreed." I had to sign a document declaring, bindingly and finally, that I was satisfied with the contract and its terms and conditions. Related word
binding
